研究表明，镇静剂和焦虑药物使用障碍的急剧增长根据Rutgers Health研究人员的说法，自2001年以来，青少年和年轻人在镇静，催眠和抗焦虑药物中复发，催眠和抗焦虑药的复发性疾病的患病率急剧增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Research-shows-sharp-growth-narp-growth-in-sediated-and-and-anxieth-medication-medication-use-use-disorders-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/research-shows-sharp-growth-narp-growth-in-sediated-and-and-anxieth-medication-medication-use-use-ise-disorders-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2DDC242A-2CD2-422B-BC61-53643D9E5FCF Thu, 23 Jan 2025 20:05:44 -0500 Research shows sharp growth in sedative and anxiety medication use disorders in youth

三分之二的患有曲折后19综合症的人会经历长期影响三分之二的人患有曲折后19综合症的患者具有一年或更长时间的持久，客观的症状，包括体育锻炼能力降低和认知测试表现降低，并且在患病的第二年，症状簇的重大变化没有重大变化。根据1月23日发表在德国弗莱堡大学的温弗里德·克恩（Winfried Kern）和同事的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/two-thirds-ople-people-with-with-post-post-covid-19-syndrome-experience-perience-perience-long-term-fermeffects.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/two-thirds-ople-people-with-with-post-post-covid-19-syndrome-experience-experience-long-term-ferm-fermeffects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B1C88CE3-52D5-40DA-A11B-83D9BBF5EBCD Thu, 23 Jan 2025 19:58:16 -0500 Two-thirds of people with post-COVID-19 syndrome experience long-term effects
研究揭示了儿童死亡的大流行尽管英格兰的儿童死亡在19日期大流行期间暂时下降，但他们现在已经升至新的高度，这是布里斯托尔大学研究人员的一项新研究，并基于独特的国家儿童死亡数据库（NCMD）数据发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/study-reveals-post-post-post-polise-rise-in-child-child-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/study-reveals-post-post-post-polise-rise-rise-in-child-child-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A6312B30-A9D3-46D2-8390-B83112D85E12 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 19:55:19 -0500 Study reveals post-pandemic rise in child deaths

Pomalidomide在增强骨髓瘤的免疫反应方面表现出希望2025年1月14日的《 Oncoscience》第12卷中发表了一份新的社论，标题为“ Pomalidomide改善了骨髓瘤的免疫特征”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/pomalidomide-shows-promise-in-enhancice-inhancing-immune-responses-in-myeloma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/pomalidomide-shows-promise-in-enhancing-enhancing-mmune-responses-in-myeloma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0574A5D1-E151-4054-B3E7-99D168F76DCE Thu, 23 Jan 2025 19:39:36 -0500 Pomalidomide shows promise in enhancing immune responses in myeloma
研究揭示了阿贝拉西单抗提高AFIB患者抗凝安全性的潜力Abelacimab是一种因子XI抑制剂，与Rivaroxaban相比，在中度至高的中风风险中，与Rivaroxaban相比，主要出血降低了62-69％，具有可比的安全性和功效。虽然缺血性中风率略高，但它们在统计上并不显着，需要进一步的3阶段试验进行确认。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/study-reveals-reveals-abelacimabe28099s-potential to-to-to-improve--improve-antist-antist-anticalagulation-safety-safety-for-afib-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/study-reveals-reveals-abelacimabe28099s-potential to-to-to-to-improve-antical-anticalagulagulation-safty-safety-for-afib-patients.aspx#comment.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=035BC70D-6BB6-4308-8426-7C104A6BD789 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 19:37:00 -0500 Study reveals abelacimab’s potential to improve anticoagulation safety for AFib patients
